      • queryLatestPlaylistVideo

        public static java.lang.String queryLatestPlaylistVideo(PlaylistId pPlaylistId)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                                        org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException,
                                                        javax.xml.parsers.FactoryConfigurationError
        Retrieve the latest video in the specified playlist.
        Parameters:
        pPlaylistId - the id of the playlist for which to retrieve the latest video id
        Returns:
        the video id of the latest video, null if something goes wrong
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
        javax.xml.parsers.FactoryConfigurationError

      • calculateYouTubeUrl

        public static java.lang.String calculateYouTubeUrl(java.lang.String pYouTubeFmtQuality,
                                   boolean pFallback,
                                   java.lang.String pYouTubeVideoId)
                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                   org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException,
                                                   java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Calculate the YouTube URL to load the video. Includes retrieving a token that YouTube requires to play the video.
        Parameters:
        pYouTubeFmtQuality - quality of the video. 17=low, 18=high
        bFallback - whether to fallback to lower quality in case the supplied quality is not available
        pYouTubeVideoId - the id of the video
        Returns:
        the url string that will retrieve the video
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

        public static int getSupportedFallbackId(int pOldId)
